tooltip_text:
The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.

Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional @BaseValues*100@% Health and Damage Amp.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentIncreaseSponsored*100@% %i:scaleHealth% %i:scaleDA%;
gain 1 sponsored item.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentIncreaseSponsored*100@% %i:scaleHealth% %i:scaleDA%;
gain 1 sponsored item.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentIncreaseSponsored*100@% %i:scaleHealth% %i:scaleDA%;
gain 1 sponsored item.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentIncreaseSponsored*100@% %i:scaleHealth% %i:scaleDA%

This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.

(@MinUnits@) Gain that Emissary's bonus
(@MinUnits@) Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth% and @SelfishDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Ambessa: Allies gain @AmbessaArmor@ Armor and Magic Resist for each opponent defeated. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Ambassador_PlayersDefeated@/7)

Garen: On Combat Start, Garen and allies to his left and right gain @GarenHealthPercent*100@% of his max Health.

Nami: Allies' attacks grant @NamiMana@ bonus Mana.

Tristana: Allies gain @StarAS*100@% Attack Speed per star level.

Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritDamage*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritDamage*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritDamage*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritDamage*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%; also gain @DamageReductionPct*100@% Durability

Your team gains @TeamFlatHealth@ max Health. Bruisers gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%

(@MinUnits@) Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after @NumCastsToUnlock@ casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below @PercentHealthUnlock*100@% health.
(@MinUnits@) Sion grows stronger and his enemies take more damage from Black Rose units.
(@MinUnits@) Sion unleashes dark magic and heals to full Health when freed.
(@MinUnits@) When Sion dies, he restores to life with power beyond death!

Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power

Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.

(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%. On target death, Quickstrikers dash to a new target and gain @ShieldAmount@ shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least @MinStreakLength@, gain more.

At each stack of @ShimmerBreakpoint@ Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.

(@MinUnits@) @ShimmerPerCombat@ or @ShimmerPerCombatStreaking@; @HealthPerSkip@ %i:scaleHealth%

Markets Skipped: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Crime_PassedMarkets@
Current Health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Crime_CurrentHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%

Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.

Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

(@MinUnits@) @NumLaboratory@ Laboratories, @MaxHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @NumLaboratory@ Laboratories, @MaxHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Experiment bonuses increase by @ExperimentBonusIncrease*100@%!

Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, @DamageReduction*100@% %i:scaleDR%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, @AttackSpeed*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, heist on topside! After combat, progress the heist, increased for each surviving Family member!

Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.

Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

(@MinUnits@) @DR*100@% %i:scaleDR% or @DA*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At @TriggerNumCrystals@ crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + @ConversionDamagePct*100@% of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ damage, @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

When casting, Sevika rolls a random Jinx modification to her Ability and gains @Durability*100@% Durability for @Duration@ seconds.

Mods:
-Rocket: Launch @Bonus1NumRockets@ rockets that deal @Bonus1RocketDamage@ physical damage each
-Shield: Gain @Bonus2ShieldAmount@ Shield for @Bonus2ShieldDuration@ seconds
-Coin: Gain @Bonus4Gold@ gold
-Triple: Enhance her rolled ability!

Every @Duration@ seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken. While dashing, gain a massive burst of Attack Speed.

Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, @APPercent*100@% %i:scaleAP%

Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @EnlightenedBonusMana*100@% %i:scaleMana%
(@MinUnits@) @EnlightenedBonusMana*100@% %i:scaleMana%
(@MinUnits@) @EnlightenedBonusMana*100@% %i:scaleMana%
(@MinUnits@) @EnlightenedBonusMana*100@% %i:scaleMana%, Abilities heal an ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt

Every @NumRounds1Star@ rounds, open an armory to purchase permanent upgrades to your strongest Rumble's mech.

Rounds Until Upgrade: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_JunkerKing_RoundsUntilOpening@

Every @NumOfAttacks@ attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals @PercentDamage*100@% Attack Damage around the target. They also gain Attack Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @AD*100@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) @AD*100@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) @AD*100@% %i:scaleAD%, Launch a rocket every @NumOfAttacks@ attacks that deals double damage.

Pit Fighters gain @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp and deal bonus true damage. Once per combat at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they heal a percentage of their max Health over @Duration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamagePercent*100@% true damage, @HealPercent*100@% %i:scaleHealth%

Rebels gain @MaxHealthIncrease*100@% max Health.

After your team loses @PercentHealthTrigger*100@% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels @BurstAS*100@% Attack Speed for @BurstDuration@ seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, @PercentMaxHealthBonus*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, @PercentMaxHealthBonus*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, and Stun all enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds
(@MinUnits@) The smoke signal triggers at Combat Start and every @ForceDuration@ seconds.

Combat start: Components held by Scrap units temporarily turn into full items. Scrap units gain Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.

(@MinUnits@) @NumComponents@ component, @HPShieldAmount@ Shield
(@MinUnits@) @NumComponents@ components, @HPShieldAmount@ Shield
(@MinUnits@) All components, and full items become lucky! @HPShieldAmount@ Shield
(@MinUnits@) Generate Radiant items! @HPShieldAmount@ Shield

Shield Amount: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_Trait_Scrap_ShieldTotal@

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex and +@BonusHexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range

Your team gains @TeamAP@ Ability Power. Sorcerers gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP%, Abilities reduce their target's damage by @DamageDecrease*100@% for @DamageDecreaseDuration@ seconds

Combat Start: Enforcers gain Shield and Damage Amp. The highest Health enemy units become WANTED!

When a Wanted enemy dies, Enforcers gain @AttackSpeedPerWantedKill*100@% Attack Speed.

(@MinUnits@) @NumOfWantedEnemies@ units; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @NumOfWantedEnemies@ units; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @NumOfWantedEnemies@ units; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @NumOfWantedEnemies@ units; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) ALL enemies; @PercentMaxHealthShield*100*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BaseDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%; Combat Start: Confiscate all enemy items!

Vander gains @TFTTrait.TFT13_Teamup_BloodBrothers.1:MaxHealthGainPerCast@ permanent max Health for each time Silco casts. Silco gains @TFTTrait.TFT13_Teamup_BloodBrothers.1:APGainPerDeath@ permanent Ability Power for each time Vander dies.

Bonuses: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Sidekick_BloodBrothers_HealthGained@ %i:scaleHealth% | @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Sidekick_BloodBrothers_APGained@ %i:scaleAP%

When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases @NumEkkoAfterImages@ afterimages, each dealing @ReducedEkkoDamage*100@% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires @NumHeimerMissiles@ missiles, each dealing @ReducedHeimerDamage*100@% damage.
Powder gains Dominator but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates @NumMonstrosities@ of Silco's monstrosities.
When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing @CaitAD*100@% damage. Ambessa gains @ADShare*100@% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target each dealing @EkkoAfterImageReducedDamage*100@% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing @ViEarthquakeReducedDamage*100@% damage.
When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains @ADBuff*100@% bonus Attack Damage for @ViDuration@ seconds. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains @ASBuff*100@% bonus Attack Speed for @JinxDuration@ seconds.
Jinx and Sevika gain @AD*100@% Attack Damage and @Health@ Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other @Mana@ mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.

Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain triple.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

Conquerors' takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by @PercentIncreasePerChest*100@% for each War Chest opened.

(@MinUnits@) @ADAPBase*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%; @StacksPerKill@x Conquest

War Chests Opened: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Warband_ChestsCompleted@
Current Stats: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Warband_CurrentADAP@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%

Watchers gain Durability, increased while above @HealthBreakpoint*100@% Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseDR*100@% or @IncreasedDR*100@% %i:scaleDR%
